description:
![screen shot of Galaxian](http://pjsfreeware.synthasite.com/resources/galaxian.png)

************** A remake of the classic shoot em up Galaxian. ***************

Added joystick control and you can redefine keys

(pj) Crossley 2009
This game is freeware,  if you have been sold it then you have been ripped off.
more games at http://pjsfreeware.synthasite.com/

###KEYS:
* Arrow keys for movement
* Anykey to fire. 
* F4 Fullscreen
* An extra life every 10000+ points
* PRESS Esc TO CLOSE
10/04/09/gm7

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/bcurran3/ChocolateyPackages/blob/master/galaxian/readme.md)**
summary: PJ Crossley's remake of the classic Galaxian game.
author: PJ Crossley
